title: The vault is open?
body: Why? where is the news post on this?

replies.body:
It is! 

In addition, other skins will be added to the vault. For more info, check out this [post](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/battle-boss-blitzcrank-sends-skins-hiding). It contains more info, as well as a full list of skins that came out of the vault, as well as the skins that will be making their way into the vault.
